author: OrchidAlloy
description: Translate messages using Google Translate for free. Supports context menu commands.
install_msg:
ðŸŽŒ __**EasyTranslate**__ ```EasyTranslate installed. Instructions:
1. Load the cog with [p]load easytranslate
2. Enable application commands with [p]slash enablecog easytranslate, then [p]slash sync
3. Right click a message -> Apps -> Translate
4. Your users may set their default language for translation with /setmylanguage```
short: Translate messages using Google Translate for free.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
